basics.name: Iris Dumeur
basics.label: Scientist
basics.summary: PhD Student at the CESBIO, working on self-supervised representation learning of satellite image time series

work.name: CESBIO
work.summary: PhD supervised by Silvia Valero and Jordi Inglada and funded by the ANR DeepChange. Development of self-supervised learning methodologies adapted to satellite image time series.

work.name: CNES
work.position: Internship at the French Space Agency
work.summary: Bi-temporal land cover change detection using digital elevation model on stereoscopic VHR Image

education.area: French national diploma equivalent to Master's degree, major in computer science
courses: Advanced Data Analysis on Spatial and Temporal data

publications.name: Self-Supervised Spatio-Temporal Representation Learning of Satellite Image Time Series
publications.publisher: IEEE Journal of Selected Topics in Applied Earth Observations and Remote Sensing
publications.summary: Development of self-supervised learning framework which harnesses Satellite Image Time Series spectral, temporal and spatial dimensions of SITS

publications.name: Toward Foundation Model for irregular and unaligned satellite image time series
publications.summary: A novel SITS encoder is proposed  which provides aligned and fixed dimensional representation of irregular and  unaligned satellite image time series. A multiview SSL framework is proposed with a novel investigation on the integration of instance discrimination loss.
